Da Nang hospital yesterday
received a boy with multiple injuries from
playing with
firecrackers. The patient was a 12-year-old boy in
Son Tra district, Da Nang city. He was taken to the
emergency room at the hospital.  Da Nang hospital in a
state of multiple ruptures. Small intestine, rectum,
ruptured bladder, crushed left arm,
left thigh, left pelvis, burns
all over the body due to explosive play during the
emergency. Doctors cleaned the wound.  The
wound removed many foreign objects. Surgery on the
hand wound, the wound in the groin and
thigh area, the ruptured small intestine was removed, and the
rectum was sutured and the bladder was sewn to create an
artificial anus to save the patient's life. The
patient is awake and being monitored.
Health Intensive treatment at the anesthesiology and resuscitation department
of Da Nang Hospital. Last week,
this hospital also received treatment
for three more cases of serious injuries caused by

A portrait of a
famous Austrian artist by Stam who has been missing
for nearly a century will be auctioned
in the spring.  This event will take place at
the Im Kinsky auction house in Austria. The
portrait of Fawn Line, one of
Clim's last works,
disappeared nearly a century ago and has only
recently reappeared in the collection.  The
private collection of an Austrian citizen's
art appraiser identified the person
depicted in the painting as Margaret Const l, the
daughter of an industrial tycoon, whose
family belonged to the upper class
Socialists and were known to be
famous patron of this artist This is the
most beautiful painting of
Clim's late period of work. A rare painting
like this has not been present on the
art market in Central Europe for many
decades also according to the world.  Kim may
have begun painting this portrait in
1917 just one year before his death from a
stroke. The color composition is wonderfully
handled so that the painting brings out a
sense of joy during the Middle Ages.
Expected colors this work can be sold
for up to 50 or even 80 million Euros
at the auction on April 24.
